++ UV Water Filtration



+++ Pre-requisites
  * Clear water with no color
  * no sediment, no tannin
  * iron: less than .3 ppm
  * hardness: less than 7 grains per gallon


  * For residential, units typically are rated in gallons per minute, 5,7,10,12.
  * Only destroys

+++ Residential Installation

  * Install after all other filtration but before it splits into hot and cold water.
